description: [Ebury](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0377) modifies the `keyutils` library to add malicious behavior to the OpenSSH client and the curl library.(Citation: ESET Ebury Feb 2014)(Citation: ESET Ebury May 2024)

external_references.description: M.Léveillé, M.. (2014, February 21). An In-depth Analysis of Linux/Ebury. Retrieved April 19, 2019.
Marc-Etienne M.Léveillé. (2024, May 1). Ebury is alive but unseen. Retrieved May 21, 2024.
